newsitem.title: GERMANY: German air passenger numbers rise 1.1 in July.
newsitem.headline: German air passenger numbers rise 1.1 in July.

text.p: The number of air passengers at German airports recovered in July with a 1.1 percent rise after a 0.4 percent fall in June, the German airports association ADV said.
A total of 10.9 million passengers were registered at the country's 16 international airports last months compared with 10.2 million in June, the ADV monthly statistical report said.
Domestic travel within Germany fell 1.4 percent in July, passenger numbers to European destinations rose 2.6 percent while intercontinental travel increased 0.7 percent.

Total air passenger numbers in Germany have risen 2.4 percent to 63.9 million January-July, with a 1.6 percent fall in domestic air travel, a 5.7 percent increase in European travel and a 0.9 percent rise in intercontinental travel. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax+44 171 542 5017
